snippet: The White House has systematically tried to bypass the media by releasing a sanitized visual record of Mr. Obama’s activities, denying photojournalists access.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Associated Press photojournalist Santiago Lyon criticizes Obama administration for systematically trying to bypass the media by releasing official photos and videos while denying access to the press; contends photos and videos handed out by the administration should be treated as propaganda until it revisits its draconian restrictions on photojournalists.
lead_paragraph: The White House has systematically tried to bypass the media by releasing a sanitized visual record of Mr. Obama’s activities, denying photojournalists access.
